DOC.criteria: Symptoms suggestive peptic ulcer disease like epigastric pain , dyspepsia , heartburn Patients receive zinc supplementation , proton pump inhibitor ( PPI ) , nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) Those present hematemesis melena Those chronic liver disease , renal failure , malabsorption previous gastric surgery
